ivr_runtime_client_params Struct Reference
Runtime Client

Detailed Description

Parameters for generating a runtime client.

See also
ivrRuntimeClientInit()

Field Documentation

char* ivr_runtime_client_params::dev_name

The device name as returned by ivrRuntimeQueryHidDevices.

See also
ivrRuntimeQueryHidDevices()
char* ivr_runtime_client_params::mode

The way the runtime will operate and provide data.

Must be one of the following values:

  • IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_RAW
  • IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_GAME
  • IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_CALIBRATION
  • IVR_RUNTIME_MODE_CAPTURE
DWORD ivr_runtime_client_params::options

A list of options to start a runtime with.

Only for internal use currently.

char* ivr_runtime_client_params::sdev_name

The camera device name as returned by ivrRuntimeQuerySerialDevices.

See also
ivrRuntimeQuerySerialDevices()
DWORD ivr_runtime_client_params::timeout

The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for any action from the client before automatically terminating the runtime.

A value of 0 is an infinite timeout.
